title: Is it worth buying an iPhone 4s in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. It makes no sense. Apple isn’t offering any software updates on that. Also please take note - it’s a phone from 2011. You’d have to carry a charger/cable which won’t be available easily. The processor and ram, although was great for its time, and even for the time Apple promised it would be good for - ( 4 odd years) , would in 2019 would not allow you to run too many apps and you’d see a bit of a lag. So let me once again clear it - if you’re already using a 4s. Keep using it till it lasts, because there’s not much you’d get after selling it, and as a phone it may just continue to work. But don’t expect the performance that the latest phone may have to offer. But don’t buy a used/new 4s now.

No. It is not worth to buy an iPhone 4S in 2019.Apple isn’t offering any software updates on that. iPhone 4S is the phone from 2011. You’d have to carry a charger/cable which won’t be available easily. If we talk about the specifications, the processor and ram, although was enough if we talk about 2011. But, now the heavy apps would make it slow to the utmost level. And of course, taking it around the corner in 2019 would look really strange. So that must be really clear till now that there’s no fun of buying a 4S in 2019. And yes, if you already have that device, use it till it’s last breath. But don’t buy a used/new 4s now.
